languages.text: {n}На лице друкари застыла раздраженная гримаса вкупе с многообещающей ухмылкой.{/n} "Мне передали, что ты жаждешь развлечений, {name}. Что ж, раз меня все равно оторвали от дел... у меня есть пара идей. Как насчет кровопускания? Обещаю, что осушу тебя не полностью".

{n}Marazhai does not look pleased by your summons. He smiles ominously.{/n} "I have been told that you seek entertainment, {name}. Well, since you demand my time... I have a few ideas for you. How does bloodletting sound? I will not drain you completely, I promise."
languages.original_text: {n}На лице друкари застыла раздраженная гримаса вкупе с многообещающей ухмылкой.{/n} "Мне передали, что ты жаждешь развлечений, {name}. Что ж, раз меня все равно оторвали от дел... у меня есть пара идей. Как насчет кровопускания? Обещаю, что осушу тебя не полностью".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai's irritated grimace is coupled with an ominous smile.{/n} "I have been told that you seek entertainment, {name}. Well, since I have already been disturbed... I have a few ideas for you. How does bloodletting sound? I will not drain you completely, I promise."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai's irritated grimace is coupled with an ominous smile.{/n} "I have been told that you seek entertainment, {name}. Well, since I have already been disturbed... I have a few ideas for you. How does bloodletting sound? I will not drain you completely, I promise."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai semble mécontent que vous l'ayez convoqué, comme en témoigne son sourire menaçant.{/n} « Il paraît que vous voulez qu'on vous divertisse, {name}. Eh bien, puisque je suis contraint de vous accorder mon temps... j'ai quelques idées à vous proposer. Par exemple, que diriez-vous d'une saignée ? Je vous promets que je ne vous viderai pas complètement. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai does not look pleased by your summons. He smiles ominously.{/n} "I have been told that you seek entertainment, {name}. Well, since you demand my time... I have a few ideas for you. How does bloodletting sound? I will not drain you completely, I promise."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai semble mécontent que vous l'ayez convoqué, comme en témoigne son sourire menaçant.{/n} « Il paraît que vous voulez qu'on vous divertisse, {name}. Eh bien, puisque je suis contraint de vous accorder mon temps... j'ai quelques idées à vous proposer. Par exemple, que diriez-vous d'une saignée ? Je vous promets que je ne vous viderai pas complètement. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai no parece alegrarse de que le hayas convocado. Sonríe de forma siniestra.{/n} «Me han dicho que buscas entretenimiento, {name}. Bueno, ya que has solicitado mi tiempo... tengo unas ideas para ti. ¿Qué te parece el desangramiento? No te dejaré seco, lo prometo».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai does not look pleased by your summons. He smiles ominously.{/n} "I have been told that you seek entertainment, {name}. Well, since you demand my time... I have a few ideas for you. How does bloodletting sound? I will not drain you completely, I promise."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai no parece alegrarse de que le hayas convocado. Sonríe de forma siniestra.{/n} «Me han dicho que buscas entretenimiento, {name}. Bueno, ya que has solicitado mi tiempo... tengo unas ideas para ti. ¿Qué te parece el desangramiento? No te dejaré seco, lo prometo».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋似乎对你的召唤不太满意，他露出了险恶的笑容。{/n}“你的随从告诉我，说你渴望娱乐，{name}。这么说吧，既然你想占用我的时间……那我确实想出了几个主意。放血听起来怎么样？我绝对不会把你彻底榨干，我保证。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai does not look pleased by your summons. He smiles ominously.{/n} "I have been told that you seek entertainment, {name}. Well, since you demand my time... I have a few ideas for you. How does bloodletting sound? I will not drain you completely, I promise."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋似乎对你的召唤不太满意，他露出了险恶的笑容。{/n}“你的随从告诉我，说你渴望娱乐，{name}。这么说吧，既然你想占用我的时间……那我确实想出了几个主意。放血听起来怎么样？我绝对不会把你彻底榨干，我保证。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは、あなたの召喚を喜んでいないようだ。不吉な笑みを浮かべている。{/n}「あなたは娯楽を求めていると聞いています。{name}私の時間を要求するのなら…いくつか考えがある。血を抜くのはどうだ？完全には消耗させないよ、約束する」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai does not look pleased by your summons. He smiles ominously.{/n} "I have been told that you seek entertainment, {name}. Well, since you demand my time... I have a few ideas for you. How does bloodletting sound? I will not drain you completely, I promise."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは、あなたの召喚を喜んでいないようだ。不吉な笑みを浮かべている。{/n}「あなたは娯楽を求めていると聞いています。{name}私の時間を要求するのなら…いくつか考えがある。血を抜くのはどうだ？完全には消耗させないよ、約束する」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai scheint nicht erfreut darüber, dass du ihn herzitiert hast. Er lächelt bedrohlich.{/n} "Mir wurde gesagt, dass Ihr Euch nach Unterhaltung sehnt, {name}. Nun, wenn Ihr mich schon ruft ... Ich hätte da einige Ideen. Wie wäre es mit einem Aderlass? Ich lasse Euch auch nicht vollständig ausbluten, versprochen."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai does not look pleased by your summons. He smiles ominously.{/n} "I have been told that you seek entertainment, {name}. Well, since you demand my time... I have a few ideas for you. How does bloodletting sound? I will not drain you completely, I promise."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai scheint nicht erfreut darüber, dass du ihn herzitiert hast. Er lächelt bedrohlich.{/n} "Mir wurde gesagt, dass Ihr Euch nach Unterhaltung sehnt, {name}. Nun, wenn Ihr mich schon ruft ... Ich hätte da einige Ideen. Wie wäre es mit einem Aderlass? Ich lasse Euch auch nicht vollständig ausbluten, versprochen."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, onu çağırmandan hoşnut kalmışa benzemiyor. Kötücül bir şekilde gülümsüyor.{/n} "Bana eğlence arayışında olduğun söylendi {name}. Madem zaman ayırmamı istedin, senin için aklımda birkaç fikir var. Kan akıtmak kulağa nasıl geliyor? Seni tamamen tüketmeyeceğim, söz veriyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai does not look pleased by your summons. He smiles ominously.{/n} "I have been told that you seek entertainment, {name}. Well, since you demand my time... I have a few ideas for you. How does bloodletting sound? I will not drain you completely, I promise."
